attributes.title: It gave me cancer.
attributes.review: As a boomer myself, I wanted to see what all of the hype was about with this app due to all of my friends (Pat and Bertha) raving about it! First of all, this app took a whole DAY to download. No joke. As soon as it finally did download I noticed that it kept crashing and my mobile device got so hot I could barely hold it. Little did I know it was actually causing my device to self-implode and release radiation which in turn gave me cancer on my buttocks (where I keep my phone). Please get rid of this app if you donâ€™t want to get cancer too.
